articles.description: Superstar scrum-half Antoine Dupont delivers by coming off the bench to lead France to their first gold of the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics rugby sevens: Antoine Dupont inspires France to gold medal in Paris

articles.description: Great Britain's Anna Henderson wins cycling road time trial silver on her Olympic debut on the rain-soaked streets of Paris.
articles.title: Olympics cycling: Anna Henderson wins road time trial silver for Team GB

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: England's Jamie Smith says he wants to keep clearing stands after his blistering knock puts the hosts in a commanding position over West Indies in the third Test.
articles.title: Jamie Smith: England's 'Rolls-Royce' wants to keep clearing roofs after Edgbaston six

articles.description: Follow live coverage of day one of Olympics 2024.
articles.title: Olympics 2024 LIVE: Watch beach volleyball & fencing - results, TV stream & updates from Paris

articles.description: Simone Biles is making her return to Olympic competition on Sunday even more hotly anticipated with the possibility she may perform another new move.
articles.title: Simone Biles could try new move at Paris 2024 Olympics

articles.description: Canada's Olympic women's football team are deducted six points and coach Bev Priestman is banned for a year by Fifa over a drone spying scandal.
articles.title: Canada's Olympic women's football team lose points & coach banned

articles.description: Divers Yasmin Harper and Scarlett Mew Jensen win Team GB's first medal of the Paris 2024 Olympics with a dramatic bronze in the women's synchronised 3m springboard.
articles.title: Olympics diving: Yasmin Harper and Scarlett Mew Jensen win Team GB's first medal with diving bronze in Paris

articles.description: Lando Norris expects to be fighting Max Verstappen for victory in the Belgian Grand Prix on Sunday - despite the pair starting fourth and 11th on the grid.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris expects Max Verstappen to contest victory despite grid penalty
